abstract: NBC may have another sci-fi hit on its hands with “Bionic Woman,” which drew Wednesday’s top ratings in advertisers’ favored demographic of adults 18 to 49, according to Nielsen’s estimates. In total viewers, the series drew 13.6 million at 9 p.m., less than ABC’s “Private Practice” (14.2 million) but more than CBS’s “Criminal Minds” (12.7 million).
lead_paragraph: NBC may have another sci-fi hit on its hands with “Bionic Woman,” which drew Wednesday’s top ratings in advertisers’ favored demographic of adults 18 to 49, according to Nielsen’s estimates. In total viewers, the series drew 13.6 million at 9 p.m., less than ABC’s “Private Practice” (14.2 million) but more than CBS’s “Criminal Minds” (12.7 million).

headline.main: A Bionic Ratings Jump for NBC
